articles.description: Many WhatsApp users reported inability to send and receive messages, while Instagram too was down during the period
articles.content:
New Delhi, March 20
Social media platforms WhatsApp, Facebook, and Instagram suffered a major outage on Friday night, but the services resumed after some time.
Many WhatsApp users reported inabilit… [+768 chars]
